pages.text: The $(item)Sculk Receiver$() is another block required for item transportation. It can take signals from $(l:sculktransporting:sculk_emitter)$(item)Sculk Emitters$() or $(l:sculktransporting:sculk_transmitter)$(item)Transmitters$() and attempts to put them in a container beneath. If that fails, the block will store the item until a suitable container is found.

pages.title: Crafting:
pages.text: The $(item)Sculk Receiver$() can be modified with $(l:sculktransporting:speed_modifiers)$(item)Speed Modifiers$(). By default, it is able to deposit all stored items every $(thing)$(t:20 ticks)1 second$().
